meanings.definition: A colorless, flammable gas used in the production of plastics.
meanings.sent1: The factory stored propylene in tanks for making plastic products.
meanings.sent2: The propylene was essential for creating various plastic items.
meanings.sent3: The propylene gas decided to join the plastic production team for some fun.
meanings.sent4: The propylene gas danced around the factory, transforming into plastic wonders.
meanings.sent5: The propylene gas hummed happily as it turned into colorful plastic toys.

meanings.definition: A type of polymer made from propylene molecules.
meanings.sent1: The propylene-based polymer was strong and flexible.
meanings.sent2: Many household items are crafted from propylene polymers.
meanings.sent3: The propylene polymer joked with the other plastics about its strength.
meanings.sent4: The propylene polymer stood out like a superhero among the plastic materials.
meanings.sent5: The propylene polymer proudly displayed its durability in everyday objects.

meanings.definition: To treat or impregnate with propylene.
meanings.sent1: The workers decided to propylene-treat the wooden furniture for protection.
meanings.sent2: They propylene-treated the fabric to make it water-resistant.
meanings.sent3: The garden gnome giggled as it was propylene-impregnated for durability.
meanings.sent4: The propylene treatment infused new life into the old materials.
meanings.sent5: The propylene impregnation made the material resilient against wear and tear.
